issue.title: News Apps: broken link under Meta
issue.body:
I submitted a pull request. Sorry for the duplication.

---

The link to "social media tags" has changed (I'm guessing).

OLD:
https://github.com/propublica/guides/blob/master/social-tags.md

NEW:
https://github.com/propublica/guides/blob/master/social-tags.html

issue.title: add new Excel row limit of 1,048,576 (i.e. 2^20) rows
issue.body: add new Excel row limit of 1,048,576 (i.e. 2^20) rows to data-bulletproofing guide in addition to 2^16 that's already there for previous Excel version

issue.title: Link support for js comment in manifesto
issue.body:
"In JavaScript, prefer events that other objects can subscribe to over direct method calls, when possible."

I WANT TO KNOW MORE. (Would love a background link in this spot.)
